text: Jonathan Rosenbaum (born February 27, 1943) is an American movie critic, journalist, and historian. He worked for the Chicago Reader until his retirement in 2008 at age 65. Rosenbaum was born on February 27, 1943 in Florence, Alabama. He was raised in Chicago, Illinois. He studied at The Putney School and at Bard College. He was never married. He now lives in Chicago, Illinois. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Blog * Chicago Reader: Jonathan Rosenbaum bibliography * Jonathan Rosenbaum's 1000 Essential Films * Interview with Rosenbaum on Orson Welles * CineScene interview * Interview with: Jonathan Rosenbaum on The Oxford American Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American historians Category:Movie critics from Chicago Category:Journalists from Chicago Category:Journalists from Alabama Category:Writers from Alabama Category:Writers from Chicago Category:People from Florence, Alabama
title: Jonathan Rosenbaum
